name: biomedicine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical research or treatment that relates to the principles of biology or biochemistry: Gene editing has enormous potential across biological science, from biomedicine to food security. She is an assistant professor of biomedicine.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir work in molecular genetics is being applied to virtually all areas of biomedicine.Nanotechnology is expected to have a dramatic impact in the fields of biomedicine and electronics.The explosion of data available today in every field from biomedicine to the arts is opening new opportunities for researchers.She talked about the rapid pace of advances in biomedicine. The applicant should have a doctoral degree in cell biology, medicine, biomedicine, or a similar topic.
